titleStmt.title: The seduction of Arthington by Hacket especiallie with some tokens of his vnfained repentance and submission. Written by the said Henrie Arthington, the third person, in that wofull tragedie.
titleStmt.author: H. A. (Henry Arthington)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. B[ourne] for Thomas Man, dwelling in Pater noster row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
"Arthingtons lamentation being held close prisoner", in verse, p. [65]-[72].
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater noster row, at the signe of the Talbot
